page.title: 17Recreation in Ladock
page.content: Most dads don't have much sparetime because they are farmers.Some of them mend cars and scramble on motor bikes. When mums have sparetime they like to read books,do gardening or play tennis and a few mums like painting pictures. Some mums make toys and watch television. Most teenagers have a lot of sparetime they usually go out with their friends to youth club or ride their B.M.X. bikes.Some do pond weeding at the fish farm to earn some money. Most children live on farms so they have to help a lot,some children are lucky, they can play with toys. If children have a horse they will ride it and groom it. There are cricket, football,darts and snooker teams in Ladock and some of the villagers take part in Grass-track racing, moto-cross and trials.{
